name: EvertonFacts

”Alexa, open Everton Facts and get a fact”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: everton facts
des:
Alexa skill to tell you facts on Everton FC .

To get started say "Alexa, open Everton Facts and get me a fact" or say "Alexa, open Everton Facts" and let the skill suggest to you what to say.

Skill is not endorsed by or affiliated with Everton Football Club or any of its partners.

Skill now available in the following language's
- English (U.K.)
- English (U.S.)
- English (Canada)
- English (Australia)
- English (India)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
